author: booklearner
content: Hey folks, I recently left my job as a SWE to take an extended sabbatical and am interested in Ethereum related research. Mostly trying to be an information sponge right now but exploring client implementations, distributed validator architecture, and some PL related stuff (like,`<insert language>` to `EVM` compilers). Feel free to hit me up, especially if you're doing anything PL related - I'd love to get involved with that!

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content:
Potentially a bit out of date, though you might find this a good starting point for PL/DSLs!
